displayImages.caption: New Delhi, India A Rohingya refugee woman returning home after washing her clothes in a makeshift settlement on the eve of World Refugee Day. There are around 50 Muslim Rohingya families living in a camp provided by Zakat Foundation of India, an NGO, near Madanpur Khadar. Most of the refugees living in this area are daily wagers and ragpickers who earn around US$5 a day. Photograph: Rajat Gupta/EPA

Most of the refugees living in this area are daily wagers and ragpickers who earn around US$5 a day.

item.title: Photo highlights of the day: Ascot Ladies' Day and migrants in Lesbos
item.trailText: Ladies’ Day at Ascot, the Baku Games and the first day of Ramadan
item.standFirst: The Guardian’s picture editors bring you a selection of the best photographs from around the world, including Ladies’ Day at Ascot, the Baku Games and the first day of Ramadan

displayImages.caption: Ascot, UK Lystra Adams attends Ladies’ Day on day three of Royal Ascot. Photograph: Chris Jackson/Getty Images
displayImages.altText: Lystra Adams attends Ladies’ Day on day 3 of Royal Ascot.
displayImages.cleanCaption: Ascot, UK Lystra Adams attends Ladies’ Day on day three of Royal Ascot.

displayImages.caption: Lesbos, Greece Syrian migrants arrive on the island. Some 48,000 migrants and refugees have landed on Greek shores so far this year, compared with 34,000 arrivals during all of 2014, according to the International Organization for Migration. Photograph: Louisa Gouliamaki/AFP/Getty Images
displayImages.altText: Lesbos, Greece Syrian migrants disembark on the island . Some 48,000 migrants and refugees have landed on Greek shores so far this year, compared to 34,000 arrivals during all of 2014, according to the International Organization for Migration
displayImages.cleanCaption: Lesbos, Greece Syrian migrants arrive on the island. Some 48,000 migrants and refugees have landed on Greek shores so far this year, compared with 34,000 arrivals during all of 2014, according to the International Organization for Migration.

displayImages.caption: Milan, Italy First Lady Michelle Obama at the United States Pavilion at the Milan Expo 2015. After visiting London, Obama travelled to Italy where she is expected to speak about her Let’s Move initiative to combat childhood obesity. Photograph: Imago / Barcroft Media/Matteo Gribaudi
displayImages.altText: Milan, Italy US First Lady Michelle Obama arrives at the United States Pavilion at the Milan Expo 2015. After visiting London, Michelle Obama has travelled to Italy where she is expected to speak about her ‘Let’s Move’ initiative to combat childhood obesity
displayImages.cleanCaption: Milan, Italy First Lady Michelle Obama at the United States Pavilion at the Milan Expo 2015. After visiting London, Obama travelled to Italy where she is expected to speak about her Let’s Move initiative to combat childhood obesity.

displayImages.caption: Tabgha, Israel A firefighter works at the site of a fire that caused heavy damage to the Church of Multiplication near the Sea of Galilee. Police are investigating whether the fire was deliberate. A passage from a Jewish prayer, calling for the wiping out of idol worship, was found scrawled in red spray paint on a wall outside the Catholic church. Photograph: Ariel Schalit/AP

displayImages.caption: Vasylkiv, Ukraine Smoke from a fuel depot fire outside Kiev. Emergency services are trying to prevent the spread of the fire, and three firefighters are reported missing after the blaze triggered a powerful explosion. The fire burned overnight and by morning had spread to at least 16 tanks, most of them storing petrol, sending a huge pall of smoke over the area Photograph: Valentyn Ogirenko/Reuters
displayImages.altText: A man rides a horse cart, as smoke from a fuel depot fire billows in the background. Emergency services are battling to prevent the spread of a deadly fuel depot fire outside Kiev, and three firemen were reported missing after the blaze triggered a powerful explosion. The fire burned overnight and by morning had spread to at least 16 tanks, most of them storing petrol, sending a huge pall of smoke over the area
displayImages.cleanCaption: Vasylkiv, Ukraine Smoke from a fuel depot fire outside Kiev.
